cgcloud__Fund_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Fund_Template__c
cgcloud__Fund_Template__c.description: Template for the creation of a Fund.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Determines whether the template is active.

cgcloud__Actual_RBF__c.description: KPI definition that's used for the Actual RBF Total KPI.

cgcloud__Anchor_Type__c.description: Specifies the anchor type of the fund.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency of the sales organization that's linked to this Fund Template.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Stores the description of the template.

cgcloud__Fund_Type__c.description: Controls the Level of the Product Anchor (if any) of the Fund.

cgcloud__KPI_Set__c.description: KPI Set that's associated with the Fund Template. The KPI sets that are associated with Fund Templates can't be deleted.

cgcloud__KPI_Subset__c.description: This subset helps filter KPI Definitions in the GridHierarchyView component. If you don't select a filter, no subset filter is applied.

cgcloud__LE_RBF__c.description: KPI definition that's used for the LE RBF Total KPI.

cgcloud__LE_Revenue__c.description: KPI definition that's used for the LE Revenue Total KPI.

cgcloud__LE_Volume__c.description: KPI definition that's used for the LE Volume Total KPI.

cgcloud__Product_Anchor_Level__c.description: Controls the Level of the Product Anchor (if any) of the Fund.
